Desc.eng: Impeccable timing, as always! Fulmigati’s creatures have entered the nearby tunnels! They are prowling around the Lair. It’s only a matter of time before they break through.
How do you like the odds, Van Helsing?
We’ve destroyed most of Breda’s minions, the waterworks is safe and there is no way that they can defeat us in our own fortress of solitude.
Sir, do you wish to begin your heroic stand against the tides of darkness immediately? Or will you be making some more preparations?
I’m fully prepared. Escort the civilians to safety and I’ll take care of our visitors.
There is no harm in deploying some more traps.
I’ll escort the members of the Resistance to the sanctuary.
And I’ll give our guests a warm welcome.
